text: George Bancroft (September 30, 1882 â€“ October 2, 1956) was an American movie actor. His career spanned seventeen years from 1925 to 1942. He was cast in many notable films alongside major movie stars throughout his Hollywood years. He died October 2, 1956, two days after his 74th birthday. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1956 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Philadelphia
title: George Bancroft (actor)
